SELECT id, department_ids, `number`, `name`, sex, age, disease, doctor_ids, in_time, exit_time, is_exit, bed_id, bed_grade_id FROM patient WHERE 1=1
AND INSTR(`name`, #{name})
AND FIND_IN_SET(#{departmentId},department_ids)
GROUP BY id ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT COUNT(id) AS dataCount, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS dataTime FROM patient WHERE 1=1
AND create_time >=DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime} , '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')
AND create_time <=DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime} , '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
AND create_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime} , '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime} , '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT COUNT(id) AS dataCount, DATE_FORMAT(in_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS dataTime FROM patient WHERE 1=1
AND in_time >=DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime} , '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')
AND in_time <=DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime} , '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
AND in_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime} , '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime} , '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(in_time,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT COUNT(id) AS dataCount, DATE_FORMAT(exit_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS dataTime FROM patient WHERE 1=1
AND exit_time >=DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime} , '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')
AND exit_time <=DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime} , '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
AND exit_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime} , '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime} , '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(exit_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
